body_html:
To be consistent with the rest of our usage, which generally favors the comma after both "i.e." and "e.g.", I'm inclined to close this.

There's no consensus on what the "correct" way to do this is, see, e.g., here.
body_text:
To be consistent with the rest of our usage, which generally favors the comma after both "i.e." and "e.g.", I'm inclined to close this.
There's no consensus on what the "correct" way to do this is, see, e.g., here.
body:
To be consistent with the rest of our usage, which generally favors the comma after both "i.e." and "e.g.", I'm inclined to close this. 

There's no consensus on what the "correct" way to do this is, see, e.g., [here](https://www.dailywritingtips.com/comma-after-i-e-and-e-g/).
